zip_code.question: Where will you host this group

goals.question: What do you hope to get out of this journey? It's cool not to know...
answers: I want to expand my relationship with God.
I want to know myself better.
I want to get to know others.
I have no idea -- and that's cool.

site.question: Which Crossroads site do you attend?

past_experience.question: Have you journeyed with us before?
answers: Nope. First time and I'm excited!
